channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meet the Fixer Helping Billionaires Flee California
item.description: Peter Thiel, Larry Page, Sergey Brin, at least a half dozen billionaires have shifted their residence since the new year. But is it enough to stop the...

item.title: Mamdani-Hochul alliance exposes affordability rift in New York state: ‘Republicans have kids, too, you can stand’
item.description: Hochul, a centrist from Buffalo, faces challenges from both her political left and right in this year's election.

item.title: Recruiters Say Job Boards Like LinkedIn Are Dead, Here’s What To Do Instead
item.description: Smart companies are sidestepping the system—and seeing results.

item.title: Meld raises $7 million to integrate stablecoin networks, build the ‘Visa for crypto’
item.description: The startup’s Meld network seeks to be a one-stop shop across different countries

item.title: Heinz’s clever new french fry box fixes a decades-old design problem
item.description: Heinz’s newest product isn’t a ketchup, or a mayo, or some Frankenstein combination of the two. It’s a box—and it’s solving a problem that’s plagued l...

item.title: Why a college degree is still worthwhile—and the 3 things it can teach you that AI can’t do
item.description: College can help safeguard employees from having their jobs offshored to India or the Philippines, Carl Benedikt Frey told Fortune.

item.title: How Clear Metrics Create High-Performing Global Teams
item.description: Clear performance measures define success in a way that empowers employees.

item.title: Detroit’s streetlights are becoming EV chargers
item.description: In a parking lot in Detroit next to the Henry Ford Museum, three streetlights now double as EV chargers. The site is one of the first installations of...

item.title: How to do an in-depth portfolio review with these 8 steps
item.description: If you’d like to do a thorough review of your portfolio and plan, here are the key steps to take. I recommend doing them over a series of sessions, no...

item.title: This billionaire tax proposal has tech titans threatening to leave California
item.description: A proposed billionaires’ tax in California has ignited a political uproar in Silicon Valley, with tech titans threatening to leave the state while Dem...

item.title: MrBeast Is a Billionaire. He Says He’s Broke
item.description: The Youtube creator says people viewing his video have ‘more money’ than he does.

item.title: Location Has a Bigger Impact on Your Workplace Culture Than Realize, but These 2 Factors Also Help
item.description: Workers are worried about their jobs in 2026, but it’s not as simple as salary concerns: how the office “feels” is important too.

item.title: Courts keep telling Trump that he can’t cut funding for ‘sanctuary cities,’ but now he’s going to try to cut states off, too
item.description: Trump unveiled the concept this time late in a speech Tuesday at the Detroit Economic Club, without offering specifics.

item.title: 49-year-old former CEO of camp for sick kids charged with embezzling over $50 million from Paul Newman-founded nonprofit
item.description: Christopher L. Butler, 49, of Porter Ranch, California, is expected to be arraigned Thursday in Los Angeles.

item.title: GoFundMe campaign for Ford worker TJ Sabula quickly tops $90K in latest politically charged fundraiser
item.description: A GoFundMe page is raising thousands to support a worker at the Ford Rouge Plant in Dearborn, Michigan, after he openly criticized President Trump—to ...
